page.title: 07EDUCATION 1
page.content:
There are three schools in Ormsgill, Ormsgill{Junior}and{Infant}schools on Mill Bank, and St. Pius X{R.C. Primary School on Schneider Rd.
Numbers on Roll- Ormsgill Infant.............136 Ormsgill Junior.............160 St. Pius X R.C. Primary.....170
In all the schools the{numbers are {rising,}and the headteachers think this is because more families are moving into{new council housing.}All over the country schools are closing because the numbers are falling. (Our own school was at risk in 1983).
Ormsgill is one of the few areas in Cumbria where the numbers of children in school are rising.
